EmailTemplate.subject: See How Duncan Aviation Supports Your HTF7000 Engine!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
With more than 1.7 million flight hours, the Honeywell HTF7000 engine has exceeded expectations for reliability, durability, and maintainability, providing business jet operators with outstanding performance and industry-leading fuel efficiency at a lower cost of ownership.
Since 2015 Duncan Aviation has been performing Minor Level maintenance activities on the HTF7000 series engine, serving operators across the country 24/7/365. Duncan Aviation’s engine shop capabilities include:
- 2000-hour combustion chamber changes - 4,000/4,800-hour and 8,000/9,600-hour boroscope inspections - Periodic maintenance - Fan section repair, as well as capabilities on the Hot Section, oil system, fuel system, bearings, carbon seals and gearbox - De-blading and re-blading turbine discs
- Rebalancing turbine discs
- New engine warranty service
- Vibration survey and fan balance
- Service bulletin and AD compliance
- Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) support
And, to get you back in the sky quickly, Duncan Aviation stocks a fleet of rental engines, offers 24/7 technical support and assistance and has a vast AOG Engine Rapid Response network ready to deploy 24/7/365.
Whether you have a scheduled or unscheduled event, you can count on Duncan Aviation to keep your HTF7000 performing at its prime. For more information, or to schedule an inspection, contact Duncan Aviation today.
